H0.text: Which cocktail consists of rum, curacao and lime juice. Blue Lagoon

H1.text: Which cocktail consists of rum, curacao and lime juice. Pina Colada

H2.text: Which cocktail consists of rum, curacao and lime juice. Mojito

H3.text: Which cocktail consists of rum, curacao and lime juice. Maitai

A4.text: Blue Lagoon is a French cocktail featuring blue Curaçao mixed with vodka and lemonade.

A5.text: The Mai Tai is a cocktail made of rum, Curaçao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice.

A6.text: Most current recipes for Mai Tais based on Trader Vic's 1944 recipe include rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange liqueur (typically orange curaçao).
